about_the_game:
FIGHT CRIME WITH CRIME!

A secret agency hired a penal military unit for cheap labor. You're one of the unlucky convicts chosen for their suicide missions. If you succeed, you'll be rewarded with cake and ice cream. If you mess up, the agency will deny its involvement in your mission.

GUNS! WAR CRIMES! DIAMONDS!

In Campaign mode, you'll take a trip to Burkan Republic. A beautiful vacation spot for families, couples, tax evaders, and irrelevant old people who have nothing better to do with their retirement funds. A relaxing paradise, where beaches are crystal clear, tropical drinks are fresh, pirates are the official welcoming committee, rebel militias forgot what they were fighting for in the first place, and government officials waste half of the country's treasury on yacht parties and keeping the other half on offshore accounts for when the country inevitably collapses.

Julius Archer is on America's most wanted list for treason, and he's hiding in this dangerous war-torn country.

JUMP STRAIGHT INTO COMBAT!

In Freelance mode, you can play 10 separate missions around the world. Kill enemies, earn cash, buy bigger guns and kill more enemies. Pure and simple.

No politicking, no navigating. Hire a team, gear up, and jump straight into battle.

LAST STAND IN NO MAN'S LAND!

In Guerrilla mode, you'll go on patrols in the South American jungle, take down drug cartels and extremist militias, and face many challenges along the way.

Your performance evaluation depends on your timing. The faster you finish the mission, the bigger your paycheck.

THE TRIP OF A LIFETIME!

  • Assemble a team of throat cutters and trigger pullers.

  • Explore a fictional war-torn country in Campaign mode.

  • Collect shiny rocks.

  • Hunt nature's deadliest predators.

  • Use sophisticated tactics to defeat simple-minded enemies.

  • Non-linear gameplay frees you to complete the campaign however you want.

  • Play 10 separate missions in Freelance mode.

  • Go on unpredictable patrols in Guerrilla mode.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: violence, blood and gore, use of drugs and alcohol, strong language, suggestive themes, general mature content, everything your parents warned you about.
